title: Capitalize month letters in date display

requirements.summary: Update date formatting to display month names in uppercase letters throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: All date displays throughout the app show month names in uppercase (e.g., 'JANUARY 15, 2025' instead of 'January 15, 2025')
The change applies consistently across all screens: Dashboard, History, Log, and Analytics
Date formatting functions in pstDate.ts return uppercased month names

file_operations.description: Modify the date formatting functions to return month names in uppercase. Update any string output that includes month names to apply .toUpperCase() transformation to the month portion while preserving the PST timezone logic and date calculation logic.
